transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+10% Ally Team Defense
+25 Action Points at battle start
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.5_1:
ATK DEF HP +22%
+25 Action Points at battle start
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+10% Ally Defense
+1 turn ally barriers at battle start (Proportional to target's Health)

SKT_FIRST.name: Flight of Abraxas
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks all enemies.\nIf it is the caster's turn, obtains <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>Desire to Dominate (Unique Resource)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> and deals greater damage to boss monsters.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Adds barrier (Proportional to Health)\nGains 1 additional Desire to Dominate

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Extra Turn\nGains 4 additional\n Desire to Dominate

description: Attacks all enemies.\nIf it is the caster's turn, obtains <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000053_1_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>Desire to Dominate (Unique Resource)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> and deals greater damage to boss monsters.

SKT_SECOND.name: Merciless God
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) Immune to <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color>, <color=#28d9ed>Frozen</color>, <color=#28d9ed>Petrified</color>, and <color=#28d9ed>Priority Reduction</color>. Damage taken from single attacks is reduced by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.\n(Triggered Effect) Prepares the <color=#28d9ed>Revenge</color> effect for every <color=#28d9ed>cooldown cycle</color> of the skill.\nAttacks all enemies and increases the caster's Priority by <color=#28d9ed>25%</color> when <color=#28d9ed>Revenge</color> is activated. This skill deals damage proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.
description: (Passive Effect) Immune to <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color>, <color=#28d9ed>Frozen</color>, <color=#28d9ed>Petrified</color>, and <color=#28d9ed>Priority Reduction</color>. Damage taken from single attacks is reduced by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000053_2_1]</color>.\n(Triggered Effect) Prepares the <color=#28d9ed>Revenge</color> effect for every <color=#28d9ed>cooldown cycle</color> of the skill.\nAttacks all enemies and increases the caster's Priority by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000053_2_3]</color> when <color=#28d9ed>Revenge</color> is activated. This skill deals damage proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: The World Is Mine
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: <color=#28d9ed>Requires 5 Desire to Dominate (Unique Resource) to use this skill.</color>\nAttacks all enemies, and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Petrified</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. The Petrified effect ignores Resilience.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> and deals increased damage to boss monsters.
description: <color=#28d9ed>Requires [Buff_V_2000053_3_1] Desire to Dominate (Unique Resource) to use this skill.</color>\nAttacks all enemies, and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Petrified</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000053_3_3] turn(s)</color>. The Petrified effect ignores Resilience.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> and deals increased damage to boss monsters.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, deals <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage to the target. \n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, deals <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000053_chain_1_1]</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage to the target. \n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000053_backup_1_1]</color>.
